location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.49 of 1825 (Political Department) to William Newnham, Chief Secretary, Government of Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a confirmation of the receipt of a despatch from Newnham, dated 28 June 1825, but only received by Stannus on 28 November 1825.
